Text:
Almost forgot: And finally, if you don't want your install in English or Norwegian language, type


Code
dpkg-reconfigure locales



in the console as root (after step 1 and 2 above) to get Debian Privacy Remix in your language. (Use Arrows, Tab and Spacebar to select your language, log out and select new language in the login menu.) 

Read more: http://linuxtracker.org/index.php?page=torrent-details&id=2629f59440f22007e1a014d372b0af86ec9972ea#ixzz186g665BB

New and trimmed down ISO with all languages:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6061315/debian_privacy_remix_%28multilanguage%29.iso
